quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you’re going to do something tonight that you’ll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: If I had to live my life again, I’d make the same mistakes, only sooner.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: ...Reach for the stars so if you fall you land on a cloud...
author: Kanye West

quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I have never let my schooling interfere with my education.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: He who does not risk, does not drink champagne.
author: Russian Proverb

quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that is not what ships are for.
author: William G.T. Shedd

quote: Some people dream of great accomplishments, while others stay awake and do them.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: It is better to do something imperfectly, than nothing perfectly.
author: Lori Grenier

quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it all away from you.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Don’t worry about looking dumb. Worry about being dumb. Ask questions!
author: Shannon Denniston

quote: I start early and I stay late, day after day, year after year, it took me 17 years and 114 days to become an overnight success.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Today is cruel. Tomorrow is crueler. And the day after tomorrow is beautiful.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: If you do not fight for what you want, than do not cry for what you lost...
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Empty your mind. Be formless, shapeless like water.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Dream Big. Start small. Act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: To double your income, triple your investment in self-development.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Be so good at what you do that no one else in the world can do what you do.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: All change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The secret to passion is purpose.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Every master was once a beginner. Every pro was once an amateur.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Success lies in a masterful consistency around a few fundamentals.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Lucky is where skill meets persistence.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The more you go to your limits, the more your limits will expand.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: I’m a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee. The hands can't hit what the eyes can't see.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you’ll start to see a big difference in your life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: It always seems impossible until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

quote: He who has the knowledge has the responsibility to impart it to the students.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
author: John Ruskin

quote: It takes a long time to become young.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: My mother said to me, 'If you are a soldier, you will become a general. If you are a monk, you will become the Pope.' Instead, I was a painter, and became Picasso.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: We don’t need to share the same opinions as others, but we need to be respectful.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: People won’t have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is simple. Do what’s right, the right way, at the right time.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him a lifetime.
author: Maimonides

quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you’ll meet them on your way down.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Where words fail, music speaks.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A hug is like a boomerang – you get it back right away.
author: Bil Keane

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: When an idea exclusively occupies the mind, it is transformed into an actual physical or mental state.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: I came, I saw, I conquered.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you don’t build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: A person should not be too honest. Straight trees are cut first and honest people are screwed first.
author: Chanakya

quote: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.
author: Chanakya

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: Set thy heart upon thy work, but never on its reward.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work. You should never engage in action for the sake of reward, nor should you long for inaction. Perform work in this world, Arjuna, as a man established within himself - without selfish attachments, and alike in success and defeat.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Feelings of heat and cold, pleasure and pain, are caused by the contact of the senses with their objects. They come and they go, never lasting long. You must accept them.
author: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: We think too much and feel too little.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Will Smith

quote: You can cry, ain't no shame in it.
author: Will Smith

quote: In my mind, I've always been an A-list Hollywood superstar. Y'all just didn't know yet.
author: Will Smith

quote: Greatness is not this wonderful, esoteric, elusive, god-like feature that only the special among us will ever taste - you know it's something that truly exists in all of us. It's very simple, this is what I believe and I'm willing to die for it. Period.
author: Will Smith

quote: Talent you have naturally, skill is only developed by hours and hours and hours of beating on your craft.
author: Will Smith

quote: I've never really viewed myself as particularly talented, where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work-ethic. You know while the other guys sleeping, I'm working, while the other guy's eating, I'm working.
author: Will Smith

quote: If you're not making someone else's life better, then you're wasting your time.
author: Will Smith

quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it's a distraction of plan A.
author: Will Smith

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
author: Confucius

quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: All birds find shelter during a rain, but an eagle avoids the rain by flying above the clouds.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful, that's what matters to me.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A lot of times, people don't know what they want until you show it to them.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: A woman's guess is much more accurate than a man's certainty.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: For the strength of the Pack is the Wolf, and the strength of the Wolf is the Pack.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: I keep six honest serving men (they taught me all i knew); Theirs names are What and Why and When And How And Where and Who.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Gardens are not made by singing 'Oh, how beautiful,' and sitting in the shade.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: There is no sin greater than ignorance.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: It's better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you'll drift in that direction.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: It's only when the tide goes out that you discover who's been swimming naked.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand that is dealt you is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Every little thing counts in a crisis.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes
author: Mark Twain

quote: The difference between the almost right word and the right word is really a large matter. ’tis the difference between the lightning bug and the lightning.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
author: Mark Twain

quote: What would men be without women? Scarce, sir...mighty scarce.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Sanity and happiness are an impossible combination.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When I was a boy of 14, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be 21, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When someone leaves, it's because someone else is about to arrive.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Don't waste your time with explanations: people only hear what they want to hear.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate.
author: Paulo Coelho
